transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello
Customer: Subah ji Namaskar.
Executive: Namaskar sir, Namaskar. 
Executive: Pranam, Subah ji baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, kaise ho aap?
Customer: Bas thik hai sir.
Executive: Actually maine call kiya tha kal aapne customer care se mail kiya tha sir ya call kiya tha ki aapko relevant lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji wohi samasya hai sir jo pehle thi na.
Executive: Kya samasya hai sir?
Customer: Marble ki lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Marble ka lead us din jab hum video calling pe the tab to maine aapko dikhaya tha marble ka lead waha pe aapne khud bhi dekha tha sir.
Customer: Lead tha woh aap samajh nahi aap. Wohi interest aa raha hai jo past mein woh.
Customer: Baad mein dikhati hai screen par na, mobile ki screen par wohi samasya aa rahi hai.
Customer: Jab woh purani ho jati hai na ghante do ghante.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wohi samasya aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ghante wali baat nahi hai agar main past lead pe abhi jaake check kar raha hu na to un 30 minute pehle bhi ek lead aaya hua tha marble Kota statue shayad Kota stand stone Kota Rajasthan se aur yeh bhi expire dikha raha hai mere paas yaha pe.
Customer: Haan woh Rajasthan ka Kota ka.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Nahi isme nahi hai ji.
Customer: Mere paas to nahi hai abhi to.
Executive: Aap ek baar open kijiyega IndiaMART.
Customer: IndiaMART open kar raha hu.
Customer: Recent mein jaate hai.
Executive: Nahi recent pe nahi jaana hai past lead pe jaana hai.
Customer: Abhi ek brass mein aa raha hai 7 minute pehle bas.
Executive: 30 minute wala jo lead hai woh Kota se hai past hai woh expire ho gaya aap se. Accha aapne bola bola ki do ghanta purani lead dikhti hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: 30 minute pehle bhi haan ghante do ghante lekin 30 minute pehle wala lead bhi mere paas dikha raha hai jo expire hai. Last time jab apni discussion hui thi sir to maine aapko bola tha ki sir kuch lead aise hote hai jo within 5 minutes mein expire ho jata hai.
Customer: Haan woh aati hai expire ho jati hai woh aate hi consume ho jati hai na.
Executive: Hmm. Matlab yeh nahi hai ki do ghanta baad wala hi lead aapko waha pe dikhayega past lead mein. Recently wala bhi ho jata hai jaise abhi maine past lead pe gaya to 30 minute pehle ka ek lead mujhe dikhaya hai ki jo expire ho gaya hai. Thik hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ab jaise yaha pe ek lead hai polyprene town kama deno proprene metal.
Executive: Waha pe jo maine bataya tha sir aapko trade.indiamart pe aapne search waha pe search kiya tha?
Customer: Haan kiya tha na. Aapke samne kiya tha us.
Executive: Ek minute.
Customer: Marble Sant Navdev statue aaya hua hai marble ka 4 ghanta pehle Mysore Karnataka se.
Customer: Haan haan haan bilkul.
Executive: Yeh lead aapko dikha?
Customer: 4 ghanta pehle ka to.
Executive: Hmm. Marble Sant Navdev statue Mysore Karnataka se aur yeh hai stone ka.
Customer: Mere mere paas yeh dikh raha hai ji. Silicon ka ek laddu Gopal.
Executive: Nahi nahi ek kaam kijiye upar search wala jo lead aa raha hai usme likhiye stone marble murti.
Customer: Haan maine karke dekha tha stone marble murti likh rakha hai.
Executive: Aap likhiye ek baar search kijiye. Namdev statue.
Executive: Haan Namdev statue aa raha hoga marble ka hai yeh. 4 ghanta pehle ka hai. 4 ghanta pehle lead ka dikh raha hai uske baad Chatrapati Shivaji aa raha hai murti yeh bhi marble ka material chahiye dekhiye dusra lead 12 ghanta pehle aa raha hai.
Customer: 12 ghanta pehle.
Executive: Haan uske baad teesra lead dikha raha hai kal ki date kya hua eagle statue yeh bhi marble ka hai.
Customer: Yeh hai yeh hai dikh raha hai.
Executive: Aapne search kiya maine bola tha aapko ki aapka perfect pattern gadbad hai to aap ek baar na lead search kar karke check kijiye waha pe dikh jayega aur jitna jyada bhi lead stone marble ka aapke paas aa raha hai usko consume karte jaiye ek sapta agar aapne currently continue kar liya na us tarike se lead consume to phir samne se aapke paas woh lead aane lagega. Main aapko last time bhi samjhaya tha jab aap YouTube dekhte hai to koi bhi channel aap YouTube pe jab dekhte hai sir to aapko pata hai jab dobara YouTube open karte hai to usi channel ka video pehle dikhata hai dikhata hai na?
Customer: Ji dikhata hai.
Executive: To usse kya hota hai ki AI jo hai aapka jo behaviour hai aapka jo pasandita hai ki aap kis cheez ko pasand kar rahe hai kis cheez ko aap dekh rahe hai wohi cheez baar baar woh aapko dikhata hai samne screen pe same cheez yaha pe bhi wohi hai.
Customer: Haan yeh main interested kahi thi na aapne interested.
Executive: Interested aapne aapne interested to like kar diya hoga ya nahi kiya hoga interested karne se chaliye AI mein aapka yaha pe fit ho jayega ki aapko interested wala lead waha pe dikha raha hai but agar interested na karke aur kuch lead bhi humne consume kar liya jaise humne abhi search kiya stone marble murti to abhi dikhaya na aapke panel pe to aise nahi dikha raha tha na bina without search kiye hue to nahi dikha raha tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Lekin ab jaise jab aapne search karke waha pe dekhe tabhi lead dikhna shuru ho gaya na aapko?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Abhi kitna Chatrapati Shivaji wala lead dikha sir aapko?
Customer: Chatrapati Shivaji wala bhi main dekhta hu. Ek mukhi Dattatreya ka marble 4 ghanta pehle ka hai.
Executive: Haan nahi 4 ghanta pehle to Sant Navdev wala hai phir 12 ghanta pehle ji ji kya pehle ka yeh bhi hai yeh bhi hai ek mukhi Dattatreya marble.
Executive: Marble hai na to woh bhi wohi lead abhi aap kya kijiye jaise aapko daily ka lead nahi mila to abhi jitna bhi marble wala aapko dikh raha hai na bhale 1000 ka hi lead ho bhale aap usko nahi bana sakte lekin marble likha hua hai na woh sare lead ko aap consume kar lijiye ek baar.
Customer: Marble ko to main sare ko karta hu.
Executive: Haan jitne bhi marble wala leads hai sare ko consume karke aur uske baad usko consume kijiye.
Executive: Haan ab jaise dekhiye ek mukhi ek mukhi Dattatreya marble statue karke koi aaya hua hai Aurangabad Maharashtra se color golden chahiye but isko marble white marble mein chahiye to woh wala bhi marble ka hi hai. Haan wohi main keh raha hu Aurangabad se jo hai iske liye. Haan haan yeh bhi to yeh sare leads ko consume kar lijiye aur consume karne ke baad usko contact by now pe click karke isko yeh aap isse nahi bhi baat karenge na deal nahi karenge lekin woh panel mein aapka fetch hote rahega to kahi na kahi aapko aage jaake woh conversion mil jayega.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Aage jaake phir aapko panel pe aise hi save kar matlab dikhane lagega sir details mein lead.
Customer: Sir main to kar raha hu na jo bhi koshish hai na maine marble murti aap daily daily alag alag filter lagaiyega ya phir waha pe search kar lijiyega directly aap jaiye usme jab bhi check kijiye stone marble murti ya marble murti yahi search karke aap lead consume kijiye.
Customer: Chalo sir aur kar lenge kar liya karenge kar to rahenge lekin aur dekh lenge.
Executive: Aur main ek group bana de raha hu WhatsApp ka aur kuch lead main aapko WhatsApp pe bhi provide kar dunga daily basis mein agar hamare paas aayega to. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Abhi jo aapne yeh concern kiya tha call karke woh band kar du hamare side se yaha pe ticket open tha sir.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Yeh aapne jo yaha pe 24 November ko call kiya tha na customer care ko. Haan haan usko band kar dijiye. Uske bhi yaha pe hamare paas uske bhi yaha pe hamare paas ek ticket open ho gaya tha ki customer ko relevant lead aa raha hai to ek baar connect karne ke liye to abhi baat chit ho gayi hai maine samjha diya leads main aapko WhatsApp pe bhi provide kar dunga yeh concern main band kar du na?
Customer: Kar dijiye lekin yeh bataiye mere mere paas aapka number number aapka yahi hai?
Executive: Main abhi number de raha hu aapko abhi pura number nahi dikh raha hoga mera wala main aapko number bhej raha hu 7765 WhatsApp kar de raha hu aapko. Haan us din number nahi the mere paas. Aap usi pe aap usi pe directly call kar lijiye. Thik hai jab bhi jarurat ho thik hai. Sir yeh ticket main band karunga na to aapke paas ek feedback ke liye mail jayega to us pe aap positive response kar dijiyega sir woh hamare liye bahut valuable hota hai.
Customer: Thik hai ji thik hai ji. Thik hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant marble leads.

- Expired leads showing in past leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how leads expire quickly.

- Suggested searching for leads using specific keywords.

- Offered to provide leads via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will create a WhatsApp group.

- Executive will provide leads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, marble, search, whatsapp, expired leads
